DOC.brief_summary: Previous study show 5-10 % Hepatitis B Virus vaccine recipient produce none antibody standard immunization 3 vaccine . These individual define non-responders . The investigator wish investigate mount another kind immune response , call cellular immune ( CMI ) response , protect non-responders . Aim/Hypothesis Primary aim : 1 . To estimate CMI response serologic non-responders receive standard course HBV immunization Secondary aim : 2 . To establish prevalence serological non-responders standard course HBV vaccination . 3 . To assess safety vaccine . 4 . Evaluate predictor serologic non-response young , healthy individual receive standard course HBV immunization 5 . To compare immunological profile standard HBV vaccination regimen non-responders responder 6 . Establish rapid test measure CMI HBV vaccinate . A total 400 healthy volunteer receive standard course immunization combine hepatitis A B vaccine ( TwinrixÂ® ) 0 , 1 , 6 month . Blood draw 0 8 month participant . The blood analyse see antibody or/and mount cellular immune response measure parameter call cytokine .
DOC.brief_title: Cellular Immunity Adult Hepatitis B-vaccinated Serologic Non-responders
DOC.criteria: Signed participant information consent Age 18 year Women childbearing potential must use effective contraceptive previous HBV infection previous HBV immunization pregnancy ( planned pregnancy within 6 month ) allergy content vaccine ( formaldehyde ) .
